page.title: 17OUR ENERGY
page.content: Few residential properties in Belper are without the main energy sources of {gas and electricity. Coal}and other {solid fuels}are also used.Most new homes have{central heating,cavity wall {insulation and double glazing}as evidence of energy conservation. In history the river played a major role as a source of power to drive the mills along the{Derwent Valley. Firms such as{English Sewing}and {Thorntons}use vast amounts of energy to drive machinery vital to the production of goods,while{Silkolene and{Deb Chemicals}use their energy in different ways in the production of their products. Vast amounts of heat energy is used by such places as{The Parkray Foundary.
